summary: This is an email chain from October 2020 regarding outstanding discovery issues in the Ghislaine Maxwell case. It lists several technical and logistical tasks, including locating specific child pornography images, converting grand jury audio, obtaining readable data from Maxwell's phone, and coordinating with FBI agents on evidence review.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Her phone data (GPS/I.D. data) is referenced as part of the discovery items needing conversion to a readable format.

events.title: Discovery Coordination Meeting
events.description: A conversation occurred about outstanding discovery items, followed by this email listing tasks.

keyFacts: Six images of child pornography were located in 'Florida boxes' and described as black and white scans.
There is an ongoing effort to convert grand jury audio into a readable format, requiring FBI assistance.
GPS/I.D. data from Ghislaine Maxwell's phone was initially unreadable (raw data) but viewable data was expected to be available.
FBI agents are conducting a responsiveness review of images, and a protocol discussion was needed.
A final sweep of media in the files was requested to ensure comprehensive review of all evidence.
